scripts.build: rimraf build && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.postbuild: cp package* build && mv build/index.js build/app.js
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir build/client && cp -r client/build/* build/client
scripts.start:build: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production node build/app.js
scripts.init:install: npm i && cd client && npm i && cd ..
scripts.init:install:ci: npm ci && cd client && npm ci && cd ..
